A far-left progressive spoke to other fellow leftists outside the RNC convention and suggested protestors follow the “St. Paul Principles” for PR reasons. He also said some gobbledygook about "time or space" and "diversity" in tactics, which supposedly was coined during the RNC convention in 2008.

It’s really unclear exactly what this guy is saying, what these people are protesting, or why their group is even a thing but it’s pretty clear that they are advocating for unlawful and maybe even violent tactics in their woke revolution.
title: Watch: Progressives condone violence outside RNC Convention, just away from them for PR reasons

title: Watch: The shrill harpies from "The View" react to the Trump assassination attempt exactly how you'd think

title: Secret Service Director Prioritized DEI Over Safety Amid Trump Assassination Attempt

description:

title: Watch: Tenacious D, who just endorsed Biden, makes gross "joke" about Trump being assassinated

description:
Not many people go through a near-death experience, and if they do you would expect their fight or flight response to be a state of shock. But that’s not what we saw with President Donald Trump, as his innate reaction was to keep fighting.

How many people have been shot in the ear and taken that as a sign to double down? Not many, and although Trump is “supposed to be dead” he has since vowed to “unify the country.”

Trump discussed his “surreal experience” in an exclusive interview with the New York Post.

Today's cover: Grateful, defiant Trump recounts surviving ‘surreal’ assassination attempt at rally: ‘I’m supposed to be dead’ https://t.co/mpGueO3E7G pic
title: Trump Says “I'm supposed to be dead” While Addressing Assassination Attempt In Interview

title: “They take your name, then your life": Crowder won't tone down his rhetoric, and neither should you

Last Friday was supposed to be the day they sentenced Donald Trump to prison for a bunch of bookkeeping errors. It got pushed to September thanks to the Supreme Court standing on the right side of history. So there was an assassination attempt on Trump's life on Saturday instead. It has caused a number of changes to the political landscape, least of all to his address on Thursday when he accepts the Republican nomination. Trump announced he rewrote his speech from attacking Joe Biden to instead calling for unity.

And when I say assassination attempt
title: Trump makes MAJOR convention change after assassination attempt: "It’s going to be a whole different speech now"

description:
On 07/13/2024, an attempt was made on President Donald Trump’s life. The internet has been flooded with conspiracy theories. Some warranted, some not. Today, we are sifting through the madness and bringing you everything we know about the terrifying incident, the alleged shooter, the tragic loss of life and how something like this could have happened. Trump's Deputy Director of Communications, Caroline Sunshine, joins us.
